name: Blitz Bounce
description:
In a futuristic city overrun by Super Macho Robots, fight in a volley match against these bionic beasts to save the city.

Assets created by Joey Schmidt and Brad Parfitt for the Illinois State Summer 2022 Game Jam with the theme "Momentum".

Additional Assets:

Background Art Base Reference - Ansimuz (https://linktr.ee/ansimuz)

Music - DOS-88 (https://dos88.itch.io/dos-88-music-library)
